original: śivaḥ śaktyā yukto yadi bhavati śaktaḥ prabhavituṃ

original: praṇantuṃ stotuṃ vā katham akṛtapuṇyaḥ prabhavati // Saul_1 //

analyzed: sakhīṣu smerā te mayi janani dṛṣṭiḥ sa karuṇā

original: gate karṇābhyarṇaṃ garuta iva pakṣmāṇi dadhatī
analyzed: gate karṇa abhyarṇam garutaḥ iva pakṣmāṇi dadhatī
purām bhettuḥ citta praśama rasa vidrāvaṇa phale
ime netre gotra adhara pati kula uttaṃsa kalike
tava a karṇa ākṛṣṭa smara śara vilāsam kalayataḥ
vibhakta traivarṇyam vyatikarita nīlāñjana tayā
vibhāti tvad netra tritayam idam īśāna dayite
punar sraṣṭum devān druhiṇa hari rudrān uparatān

original: rajaḥ sattvaṃ bibhrat tama iti guṇānāṃ trayam iva // Saul_53 //
analyzed: rajaḥ sattvam bibhrat tamaḥ iti guṇānām trayam iva
pavitrīkartum naḥ paśupati para adhīna hṛdaye
dayā mitraiḥ netraiḥ aruṇa dhavala śyāma rucibhiḥ

original: nadaḥ śoṇo gaṅgā tapanatanayeti dhruvam amuṃ
analyzed: nadaḥ śoṇaḥ gaṅgā tapanatanayā iti dhruvam amum

original: trayāṇāṃ tīrthānām upanayasi saṃbhedam anaghe // Saul_54 //
analyzed: trayāṇām tīrthānām upanayasi saṃbhedam anaghe
tava aparṇe karṇejapa nayana paiśunya cakitā
nilīyante toye niyatam animeṣāḥ śapharikāḥ
iyam ca śrīḥ baddha chada puṭa kapāṭam kuvalayam

original: jahāti pratyūṣe niśi ca vighaṭayya praviśati // Saul_55 //
analyzed: jahāti pratyūṣe niśi ca vighaṭayya praviśati
nimeṣa unmeṣābhyām pralayam udayam yāti jagatī
tava iti āhuḥ santaḥ dharaṇidhara rājanya tanaye

original: tvadunmeṣāj jātaṃ jagad idam aśeṣaṃ pralayataḥ
analyzed: tvad unmeṣāt jātam jagat idam aśeṣam pralayataḥ

original: paritrātuṃ śaṅke parihṛtanimeṣās tava dṛśaḥ // Saul_56 //
analyzed: paritrātum śaṅke parihṛta nimeṣāḥ tava dṛśaḥ
dṛśā drāghīyasyā dara dalita nīlotpala rucā

original: davīyāṃsaṃ dīnaṃ snapaya kṛpayā mām api śive /
analyzed: davīyāṃsam dīnam snapaya kṛpayā mām api śive

original: anenāyaṃ dhanyo bhavati na ca te hānir iyatā
analyzed: anena ayam dhanyaḥ bhavati na ca te hāniḥ iyatā

original: vane vā harmye vā samakaranipāto himakaraḥ // Saul_57 //
analyzed: vane vā harmye vā sa makara nipātaḥ himakaraḥ
arālam te pālī yugalam agarājanya tanaye
na keṣām ādhatte kusuma śara kodaṇḍa kutukam
tiraścīnaḥ yatra śravaṇapatham ullaṅghya vilasan
apāṅga vyāsaṅgaḥ diśati śara saṃdhāna dhiṣaṇām
sphurat gaṇḍa ābhoga pratiphalita tāṭaṅka yugalam

original: catuścakraṃ manye tava mukham idaṃ manmatharatham /
analyzed: catur cakram manye tava mukham idam manmatha ratham
yam āruhya druhyati avani ratham arka indu caraṇam

original: mahāvīro māraḥ pramathapataye svaṃ jitavate // Saul_59 //
analyzed: mahāvīraḥ māraḥ pramatha pataye svam jitavate
sarasvatyāḥ sūktīḥ amṛta laharī kauśa laharīḥ
pibantyāḥ śarvāṇi śravaṇa culukābhyām aviratam
camatkāra ślāghā calita śirasaḥ kuṇḍala gaṇaḥ

original: jhaṇatkārais tāraiḥ prativacanam ācaṣṭae iva te // Saul_60 //
analyzed: jhaṇatkāraiḥ tāraiḥ prativacanam ācaṣṭe iva te
asau nāsā vaṃśaḥ tuhinagiri vaṃśa dhvaja paṭi

original: tvadīyo nedīyaḥ phalatu phalam asmākam ucitam /
analyzed: tvadīyaḥ nedīyaḥ phalatu phalam asmākam ucitam
vahan antar muktāḥ śiśiratara niśvāsa ghaṭitāḥ

original: samṛddhyā yas tāsāṃ bahir api ca muktāmaṇidharaḥ // Saul_61 //
analyzed: samṛddhyā yaḥ tāsām bahis api ca muktā maṇi dharaḥ
prakṛtyāḥ raktāyāḥ tava sudati dantacchada ruceḥ
pravakṣye sādṛśyam janayatu phalam vidruma latā
na bimbam tad bimba pratiphalana lābhāt aruṇitam

original: tulām adhyāroḍhuṃ katham iva vilajjeta kalayā // Saul_62 //
analyzed: tulām adhyāroḍhum katham iva vilajjeta kalayā
smita jyotsnā jālam tava vadana candrasya pibatām
cakorāṇām āsīt ati rasa tayā cañcu jaḍimā
atas te śītāṃśoḥ amṛta laharīm amla rucayaḥ

original: pibanti svacchandaṃ niśiniśi bhṛśaṃ kāñcikadhiyā // Saul_63 //
analyzed: pibanti svacchandam niśi niśi bhṛśam kāñcika dhiyā
a viśrāntam patyuḥ guṇa gaṇa kathā āmreḍana japā

original: japāpuṣpacchāyā tava janani jihvā jayati sā /
analyzed: japā puṣpa chāyā tava janani jihvā jayati sā
yat agra āsīnāyāḥ sphaṭika dṛṣad accha chavi mayī
sarasvatyāḥ mūrtiḥ pariṇamati māṇikya vapuṣā
raṇe jitvā daityān apahṛta śirastraiḥ kavacibhiḥ
nivṛttaiḥ caṇḍāṃśu tripura hara nirmālya vimukhaiḥ
viśākha indra upendraiḥ śaśi viśada karpūra śakalā
vilīyante mātar tava vadana tāmbūlaka balāḥ
vipañcyā gāyantī vividham avadānam paśupateḥ
tvayā ārabdhe vaktum calita śirasā sādhu vacane
tvadīyaiḥ mādhuryaiḥ apalapita tantrī kalaravām

original: nijāṃ vīṇāṃ vāṇī niculayati colena nibhṛtam // Saul_66 //
analyzed: nijām vīṇām vāṇī niculayati colena nibhṛtam
kara agreṇa spaṣṭam tuhinagiriṇā vatsala tayā
girīśena udastam muhur adhara pāna ākula tayā
kara grāhyam śaṃbhoḥ mukha mukura vṛntam girisute

original: kathaṃkāraṃ brūmas tava cibukam aupamyarahitam // Saul_67 //
analyzed: kathaṃkāram brūmaḥ tava cibukam aupamya rahitam
bhuja āśleṣāt nityam pura damayituḥ kaṇṭakavatī
tava grīvā dhatte mukha kamala nāla śriyam iyam
svatas śvetā kālāgaru bahala jambāla malinā
mṛṇālī lālityam vahati yat adhas hāra latikā
gale rekhāḥ tisraḥ gati gamaka gīta eka nipuṇe
vivāha vyānaddha triguṇa guṇa saṃkhyā pratibhuvaḥ
virājante nānāvidha madhura rāga ākara bhuvām

original: trayāṇāṃ grāmāṇāṃ sthitiniyamasīmāna iva te // Saul_69 //
analyzed: trayāṇām grāmāṇām sthiti niyama sīmānaḥ iva te
mṛṇālī mṛdvīnām tava bhuja latānām catasṛṇām
caturbhiḥ saundaryam sarasija bhavaḥ stauti vadanaiḥ
nakhebhyaḥ saṃtrasyan prathama mathanāt andhaka ripoḥ
caturṇām śīrṣāṇām samam abhaya hasta arpaṇa dhiyā
nakhānām uddyotaiḥ nava nalina rāgam vihasatām

original: karāṇāṃ te kāntiṃ kathaya kathayāmaḥ katham ume /
analyzed: karāṇām te kāntim kathaya kathayāmaḥ katham ume

original: kayā cid vā sāmyaṃ bhajatu kalayā hanta kamalaṃ
analyzed: kayā cit vā sāmyam bhajatu kalayā hanta kamalam
yadi krīḍat lakṣmīcaraṇa tala lākṣā aruṇa dalam
samam devi skanda dvipa vadana pītam stana yugam

original: tavedaṃ naḥ khedaṃ haratu satataṃ prasnutamukham /
analyzed: tava idam naḥ khedam haratu satatam prasnuta mukham
yat ālokya āśaṅkā ākulita hṛdayaḥ hāsa janakaḥ

original: svakumbhau herambaḥ parimṛśati hastena jhaṭiti // Saul_72 //
analyzed: sva kumbhau herambaḥ parimṛśati hastena jhaṭiti
amū te vakṣojau amṛta rasa māṇikya kutupau
na saṃdeha spandaḥ nagapati patāke manasi naḥ
pibantau tau yasmāt avidita vadhū saṃgama rasau
kumārau adya api dvirada vadana krauñca dalanau
vahati amba stambera mad anuja kumbha prakṛtibhiḥ
samārabdhām muktāmaṇibhiḥ amalām hāra latikām
kuca ābhogaḥ bimba adhara rucibhiḥ antar śabali tām

original: pratāpavyāmiśrāṃ puravijayinaḥ kīrtim iva te // Saul_74 //
analyzed: pratāpa vyāmiśrām pura vijayinaḥ kīrtim iva te
tava stanyam manye dharaṇidhara kanye hṛdayataḥ
payaḥ pārāvāraḥ parivahati sārasvataḥ iva

original: dayāvatyā dattaṃ draviḍaśiśur āsvādya tava yat
analyzed: dayāvatyā dattam draviḍa śiśuḥ āsvādya tava yat

original: kavīnāṃ prauḍhānām ajani kamaniyaḥ kavayitā // Saul_75 //
analyzed: kavīnām prauḍhānām ajani kamaniyaḥ kavayitā
hara krodha jvālā āvalibhiḥ avalīḍhena vapuṣā
gabhīre te nābhī sarasi kṛta saṅgaḥ manasijaḥ
samuttasthau tasmāt acala tanaye dhūmalatikā

original: janas tāṃ jānīte janani tava romāvalir iti // Saul_76 //
analyzed: janaḥ tām jānīte janani tava roma āvaliḥ iti
yat etat kālindī tanutara taraṅga ākṛti śive

original: kṛśe madhye kiṃ cij janani tava tad bhāti sudhiyām /
analyzed: kṛśe madhye kim cit janani tava tat bhāti su dhiyām
vimardāt anyoanyam kuca kalaśayoḥ antara gatam

original: tanūbhūtaṃ vyoma praviśad iva nābhīkuhariṇīm // Saul_77 //
analyzed: tanūbhūtam vyoma praviśat iva nābhī kuhariṇīm
sthiraḥ gaṅgā āvartaḥ stana mukula roma āvali latā
kalā vālam kuṇḍam kusuma śara tejaḥ hutabhujaḥ

original: rater līlāgāraṃ kim api tava nābhīti girije
analyzed: rateḥ līlā āgāram kim api tava nābhi iti girije
bila dvāram siddheḥ giriśa nayanānām vijayate
nisarga kṣīṇasya stana taṭa bhareṇa klama juṣaḥ

original: namanmūrter nābhau baliṣu śanakais truṭyatae iva /
analyzed: naman mūrteḥ nābhau baliṣu śanakais truṭyate iva
ciram te madhyasya truṭita taṭinī tīra taruṇā
sama avasthā sthemnaḥ bhavatu kuśalam śailatanaye
kucau sadyas svidyat taṭa ghaṭita kūrpāsa bhidurau
kaṣantau dormūle kanaka kalaśa ābhau kalayatā

original: tava trātuṃ bhaṅgād alam iti vilagnaṃ tanubhuvā
analyzed: tava trātum bhaṅgāt alam iti vilagnam tanubhuvā

original: tridhā naddhaṃ devi trivali lavalīvallibhir iva // Saul_80 //
analyzed: tridhā naddham devi trivali lavalī vallibhiḥ iva
guru tvam vistāram kṣitidhara patiḥ pārvati nijān
nitambāt ācchidya tvayi haraṇa rūpeṇa nidadhe

original: atas te vistīrṇo gurur ayam aśeṣāṃ vasumatīṃ
analyzed: atas te vistīrṇaḥ guruḥ ayam aśeṣām vasumatīm

original: nitambaprāgbhāraḥ sthagayati laghutvaṃ nayati ca // Saul_81 //
analyzed: nitamba prāgbhāraḥ sthagayati laghu tvam nayati ca
karīndrāṇām śuṇḍāḥ kanaka kadalī kāṇḍa paṭalīm

original: ubhābhyām ūrubhyām ubhayam api nirjitya bhavatī /
analyzed: ubhābhyām ūrubhyām ubhayam api nirjitya bhavatī
su vṛttābhyām patyuḥ praṇati kaṭhinābhyām girisute
vijigye jānubhyām vibudha kari kumbha dvayam api
parājetum rudram dviguṇa śara garbhau girisute

original: niṣaṅgau jaṅghe te viṣamaviśikho bāḍham akṛta /
analyzed: niṣaṅgau jaṅghe te viṣama viśikhaḥ bāḍham akṛta
yad agre dṛśyante daśa śara phalāḥ pāda yugalī
nakha agra chadmānaḥ sura mukuṭa śāṇa eka niśitāḥ

original: śrutīnāṃ mūrdhāno dadhati tava yau śekharatayā
analyzed: śrutīnām mūrdhānaḥ dadhati tava yau śekhara tayā

original: mamāpy etau mātaḥ śirasi dayayā dhehi caraṇau /
analyzed: mama api etau mātar śirasi dayayā dhehi caraṇau
yayoḥ pādyam pāthaḥ paśupati jaṭā jūṭa taṭinī
yayoḥ lākṣā lakṣmīḥ aruṇa hari cūḍāmaṇi ruciḥ
namovākam brūmaḥ nayana ramaṇīyāya padayoḥ
tava asmai dvandvāya sphuṭa ruci rasa alaktakavate
asūyati atyantam yat abhihananāya spṛhayate
paśūnām īśānaḥ pramada vana kaṅkeli tarave
mṛṣā kṛtvā gotra skhalanam atha vailakṣya namitam
lalāṭe bhartāram caraṇa kamale tāḍayati te
cirāt antar śalyam dahana kṛtam unmūlitavatā
tulā koṭi kvāṇaiḥ kilikilitam īśāna ripuṇā
himānī hantavyam himagiri taṭa ākrānti caturau

original: niśāyāṃ nidrāṇāṃ niśi ca parabhāge ca viśadau /
analyzed: niśāyām nidrāṇām niśi ca parabhāge ca viśadau
param lakṣmī pātram śriyam atisṛjantau samayinām

original: sarojaṃ tvatpādau janani jayataś citram iha kim // Saul_87 //
analyzed: sarojam tvad pādau janani jayataḥ citram iha kim

original: padaṃ te kāntīnāṃ prapadam apadaṃ devi vipadāṃ
analyzed: padam te kāntīnām prapadam a padam devi vipadām
katham nītam sadbhiḥ kaṭhina kamaṭhī karpara tulām
katham vā bāhubhyām upayamana kāle purabhidā

original: yad ādāya nyastaṃ dṛṣadi dayamānena manasā // Saul_88 //
analyzed: yat ādāya nyastam dṛṣadi dayamānena manasā
nakhaiḥ nāka strīṇām kara kamala saṃkoca śaśibhiḥ

original: tarūṇāṃ divyānāṃ hasata iva te caṇḍi caraṇau /
analyzed: tarūṇām divyānām hasataḥ iva te caṇḍi caraṇau
phalāni svasthebhyaḥ kisalaya kara agreṇa dadatām

original: daridrebhyo bhadrāṃ śriyam aniśam ahnāya dadatau // Saul_89 //
analyzed: daridrebhyaḥ bhadrām śriyam aniśam ahne dadatau
kadā kāle mātar kathaya kalita alaktaka rasam
pibeyam vidyā arthī tava caraṇa nirṇejana jalam
prakṛtyā mūkānām api ca kavi tā kāraṇa tayā
yat ādhatte vāṇī mukha kamala tāmbūla rasa tām
padanyāsa krīḍā paricayam iva ārabdhu manasaḥ

original: carantas te khelaṃ bhavanakalahaṃsā na jahati /
analyzed: carantaḥ te khelam bhavana kalahaṃsāḥ na jahati
su vikṣepe śikṣām subhaga maṇi mañjīra raṇita
cchalāt ācakṣāṇam caraṇa kamalam cāru carite
arālā keśeṣu prakṛti saralā manda hasite

original: śirīṣābhā citte dṛṣad iva kaṭhorā kucataṭe /
analyzed: śirīṣa ābhā citte dṛṣad iva kaṭhorā kuca taṭe
bhṛśam tanvī madhye pṛthuḥ urasija āroha viṣaye

original: jagat trātuṃ śaṃbhor jayati karuṇā kā cid aruṇā // Saul_92 //
analyzed: jagat trātum śaṃbhoḥ jayati karuṇā kā cit aruṇā
purārāteḥ antaḥpuram asi tatas tvad caraṇayoḥ
saparyā maryādā tarala karaṇānām a sulabhā

original: tathā hy ete nītāḥ śatamakhamukhāḥ siddhim atulāṃ
analyzed: tathā hi ete nītāḥ śata makha mukhāḥ siddhim atulām
tava dvāra upānta sthitibhiḥ aṇima ādyābhiḥ amarāḥ
gatāḥ te mañca tvam druhiṇa hari rudra īśvara bhṛtaḥ
tvadīyānām bhāsām pratiphalana lābha aruṇa tayā

original: śarīrī śṛṅgāro rasa iva dṛśāṃ dogdhi kutukam // Saul_94 //
analyzed: śarīrī śṛṅgāraḥ rasaḥ iva dṛśām dogdhi kutukam
kalābhiḥ karpūraiḥ marakata karaṇḍam nibiḍitam
atas tvad bhogena pratidinam idam rikta kuharam

original: vidhir bhūyobhūyo nibiḍayati nūnaṃ tava kṛte // Saul_95 //
analyzed: vidhiḥ bhūyas bhūyas nibiḍayati nūnam tava kṛte
sva deha udbhūtābhiḥ ghṛṇibhiḥ aṇima ādyābhiḥ abhitas

original: niṣevye nitye tvām aham iti sadā bhāvayati yaḥ /
analyzed: niṣevye nitye tvām aham iti sadā bhāvayati yaḥ
kim āścaryam tasya trinayan samṛddhim tṛṇayataḥ
mahā saṃvarta agniḥ viracayati nīrājana vidhim

original: kalatraṃ vaidhātraṃ katikati bhajante na kavayaḥ
analyzed: kalatram vaidhātram kati kati bhajante na kavayaḥ

original: śriyo devyāḥ ko vā na bhavati patiḥ kair api dhanaiḥ /
analyzed: śriyaḥ devyāḥ kaḥ vā na bhavati patiḥ kaiḥ api dhanaiḥ

original: mahādevaṃ hitvā tava sati satīnām acarame
analyzed: mahādevam hitvā tava sati satīnām acarame

original: kucābhyām āsaṅgaḥ kuravakataror apy asulabhaḥ // Saul_97 //
analyzed: kucābhyām āsaṅgaḥ kuravaka taroḥ api a sulabhaḥ
girām āhuḥ devīm druhiṇa gṛhiṇīm āgama vidaḥ
hareḥ patnīm padmām hara sahacārīm adri tanayām
turīyā kā api tvam duradhigama niḥsīma mahimā
mahāmāye viśvam bhramayasi para brahma mahiṣi
sarasvatyā lakṣmyā vidhi hari sapatnaḥ viharate
rateḥ pātivratyam śithilayati ramyeṇa vapuṣā
ciram jīvan eṣa kṣapita paśu pāśa vyatikaraḥ
para brahma abhikhyam rasayati rasam tvad bhajanavān
sudhā sūteḥ candropala jala lavaiḥ arghya ghaṭanā
svakīyaiḥ ambhobhiḥ salilanidhi sauhitya karaṇam

original: tvadīyābhir vāgbhis tava janani vācāṃ stutir iyam // Saul_100 //
analyzed: tvadīyābhiḥ vāgbhiḥ tava janani vācām stutiḥ iyam
samānītaḥ padbhyām maṇi mukura tām ambaramaṇiḥ
bhayāt antar baddha stimita kiraṇa śreṇi masṛṇaḥ
dadhāti tvad vaktram pratiphalitam a śrānti vikacam
nirātaṅkam candrāt nija hṛdaya paṅkeruham iva
samudbhūta sthūla stana bharam uraḥ cāru hasitam
kaṭākṣe kandarpaḥ kusumita kadamba dyuti vapuḥ

original: harasya tvadbhrāntiṃ manasi janayām āsa madano
analyzed: harasya tvad bhrāntim manasi janayām āsa madano

original: bhavatyā ye bhaktāḥ pariṇatir amīṣām iyam ume // Saul_102 //
analyzed: bhavatyāḥ ye bhaktāḥ pariṇatiḥ amīṣām iyam ume

original: nirātaṅke nitye nigamaya mamāpi stutim imām // Saul_103 //
analyzed: nirātaṅke nitye nigamaya mama api stutim imām
